examples: The letter instructed him to report to headquarters immediately.
La carta le indicaba que se presentara inmediatamente a la sede.
You will be instructed where to go as soon as the plane is ready.
Se le indicará a dónde ir tan pronto como el avión esté listo.
She arrived at 10 o'clock as instructed.
Llegó a las 10 en punto según las instrucciones.
He instructed that a wall be built around the city.
Ordenó que se construyera un muro alrededor de la ciudad.
